page.title: 07A day in the life of a child
page.content:
I live in Shutford and get up at 7, have breakfast and catch the school bus at 8.15. We arrive at 8.30. School starts with assembly. Morning break is at 10.20 and lasts 20mins. I have sandwiches at lunchtime and leave at 15.00. I get home at 15.30, watch TV have tea play and go to bed at 21.00.
I get up at 6.45, have breakfast and get my lunch and swimming things ready. At 8.25 we go to school. In the morning I have a violin lesson. I am working for grade 2. After that I go swimming. I am working for the Dolphin amateur swimming award. I go home and do my homework, violin practice, then I go to tennis lessons at Warriner Comprehensive school. The lessons are an hour long. I watch a video, have tea, watch TV and go to bed.
